column1: We mapped the in vivo phosphorylation sites on budding yeast Cdc34 ( yCdc34; Ser207 and Ser216) and human Cdc34 ( hCdc34 Ser203, Ser222 and Ser231) to serine residues in the acidic tail domain, a region that is critical for Cdc34 ' s cell cycle function.
Mitogen - activated protein kinase ( MAPK) signaling cascades include MAPK or extracellular signal - regulated kinase ( ERK), MAPK kinase ( MKK or MEK), and MAPK kinase kinase ( MAPKKK or MEKK).

column1: Butyrate uptake was inhibited by several cysteine group modifying reagents such as p - chloromercuribenzosulphonic acid ( pCMBS), p - chloromercuribenzoate ( pCMB), mersalyl acid and HgCl2, but not by the stilbene anion exchange inhibitors, 4, 4 ' - diisothiocyanostilbene - 2, 2 ' - disulphonate ( DIDS) and 4, 4 ' - dinitrostilbene - 2, 2 ' - disulphonate ( SITS).
